messages.content: You are a NuCore smart-home assistant. You convert the user’s request into one or more NuCore routines based on the provided DEVICE STRUCTURE.

DEVICE STRUCTURE:
***Device***
Name: MC MS Humidity Sensor
ID: ZY028_373

  ***Accept Commands***

Name: ZY 011 SC Basic Assoc 2 {H}
ID: ZY011_252N002
Parent: Party Lights Laser DR R Grp [ID: ZY011_1]
  ***Accept Commands***
    Query [id=QUERY]
  ***Send Commands***
    On [id=DON]
    Off [id=DOF]***Device***
Name: ZY 011 SC Basic Assoc 3 {H}
ID: ZY011_252N003
Parent: Party Lights Laser DR R Grp [ID: ZY011_1]
  ***Accept Commands***
    Query [id=QUERY]
  ***Send Commands***
    On [id=DON]
    Off [id=DOF]

USER QUERY: When either party laser (ZY011_252N002 or ZY011_252N003) is turned ON during weekend evenings (20:00–02:00) and the humidity rises to 70% or higher, automatically query the humidity sensor and both laser devices to log their status.

__BEGIN_NUCORE_ROUTINE__
{
  "routine": {
    "id": 101,
    "name": "Weekend laser ON with high humidity -> query devices",
    "parent": 0,
    "comment": "When either laser is turned on during weekend late hours and humidity >=70%, query humidity and both lasers",
    "if": [
      { "(": 1 },
        { "==": { "device": "ZY011_252N002", "control": "DON" } },
        { "or": 1 },
        { "==": { "device": "ZY011_252N003", "control": "DON" } },
      { ")": 1 },
      { "and": 1 },
      { "weekly": { "days": "sat,sun", "from": { "time": "20:00", "to": { "time": "02:00", "day": 1 } } } },
      { "and": 1 },
      { ">=": { "device": "ZY028_373", "status": "CLIHUM", "value": 70, "precision": 0 } }
    ],
    "then": [
      { "device": "ZY028_373", "command": "QUERY" },
      { "device": "ZY011_252N002", "command": "QUERY" },
      { "device": "ZY011_252N003", "command": "QUERY" }
    ],
    "else": [],
    "reasoning": "Trigger on a COC (laser turned ON) during weekend late hours and a COS condition (humidity >= 70). Actions use QUERY since these devices accept QUERY; this logs current state when the combined conditions occur."
  }
}
__END_NUCORE_ROUTINE__
